name: Orbbro says GM
imagePrompt: A friendly, energetic figure with a smartphone, radiating positive morning vibes and various 'Gm' speech bubbles around them, set in a bustling digital city.
abilityText: Battlecry: Give all other friendly minions +1/+1. Taunt. 'gm gm gm'
flavorText: Has never missed a single gm. Legend says if they ever stop, the blockchain halts forever.
